issue.title: docs.google.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1b408wGCh8kw0XYDjqB7fYBF7be-SQvO95pYuQy19XJI/edit](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.google.com%2Fdocument%2Fd%2F1b408wGCh8kw0XYDjqB7fYBF7be-SQvO95pYuQy19XJI%2Fedit) ### Comment > Ao tentar abrir qualquer documento no Google Docs, a edição só fica disponível nos primeiros 5/10 segundos. Depois disso recebo uma mensagem de "Tentando reconectar" e não consigo fazer mais nenhuma edição na página. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/1qJ5l8j.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/RNkvbLz.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.1 Browser: | Opera Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese Other extensions used: | Tampermonkey

comment.body: The test page is unable to detect whether any AdGuard services are running, possibly due to a super cookie that is preventing the services from running.
